sen.e: Although it was designated as a national historical site as the 'remains of the Yamashiro Kokubun-ji Temple' since July 1, 1957, the change of the place name as 'Kuni no miya ato/ Kunikyu seki' (the remains of Kunikyo) (the remains of the Yamashiro Kokubun-ji Temple) was requested at the Council for Cultural Affairs on November 17, 2006, and the new name was announced through the official gazettes on February 6, 2007.
